hero.name: Jan Pakos
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: I am a dedicated software developer with a strong focus on building modern web applications. My expertise includes creating efficient, scalable, and user-centric solutions. While I specialize in backend development with Python and Java, I am also proficient in frontend and full-stack development. I am open to exploring opportunities that align with my skills and interests. Additionally, I am an amateur fitness enthusiast and football player.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Here are the technologies I work with, from my strongest skills to those I'm actively learning.

projects.title: My Experience
projects.description: A showcase of projects I've worked on, demonstrating my skills and experience in software development.

project1.project1-title: Head of Web Dev for Systemvetardagen
project1.project1-description: Comprehensive job fair platform serving Stockholm university students and recruiting companies featuring company profiles and event information with a bilingual interface

project2.project1-description: A streamlined web-based messaging platform where users can send, receive, and archive messages all in one place.

project3.project1-description: Auction website built, allowing users to create accounts, list items for auction, place bids, and manage their auction activities.

project4.project1-description: A Java program which allows users to register owners and their dogs and keep track of the relations between them, text-based interface.

project5.project1-description: Developed a robust Java application featuring an intuitive GUI for geographical pathfinding and visualization. This tool enables users to import map imagery, digitally represent cities and interconnected routes, and efficiently calculate the shortest or most optimal paths between selected locations.

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.description: My academic background, courses and certifications that shaped my technical knowledge.

degreefinance.title: B.Sc. Business Administration (Finance)
degreefinance.description: I used Microsoft Excel for financial calculations, PowerPoint for presentations, and Word for collaborative writing during my studies. My curriculum covered management, financial statistics, and accounting. I also used R to build ARIMA models on time series data. My bachelorâ€™s thesis analyzed historical stock data for statistically significant deviations from expectations.

degreecs.title: Bachelor of Computer and Systems Sciences
degreecs.description: Gained a strong foundation in computer science, specializing in object-oriented programming with Java, data structures, and algorithms. Developed skills in UI/UX design using JavaFX, and applied SQL for database management, alongside Python for diverse applications. Proficient in UML for object-oriented design and familiar with Assembly and computer architecture fundamentals.

coursecs50.title: CS50's Introduction to Computer Science
coursecs50.description: An introduction to algorithms, data structures, web development, and more, using languages such as C, Python and SQL.

coursecs50w.title: CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
coursecs50w.description: Web development with Django, React, and SQL. Topics include database design, scalability, security, and user experience.
